title: ROCKIN' and ROLLIN'
body_text:
Support RELAY FOR LIFE!
EastCoastDodgeball
lends a helping hand in the fight against cancer! On site will be a special donations bucket set up by the one and the only
Melissa Kerr
. Every little bit counts!
A "Family Affair"!
The countdown will cease to exist once Saturday, May 31, rolls around. Finally, the parents, guardians, and family members of the diehard dodgeballers of the modern era pay a visit to the hallowed battlegrounds. Will the respected matriarchs and patriarchs of such superstars take a chance and fight alongside their precious gems? You won't know unless you show!
Raffle Information
Players - make sure your loved ones bring the special raffle ticket stapled to the second mailed letter! Only the 'rents who attend are eligible for the grand prize!
The MAIN EVENT!
Tronolone vs. Megill
,
C. Adams vs. Fitzpatrick
,
T. Adams vs. Pierce
,
Letsche vs. Cornero
- titanic-sized clashes that each left an indelible mark on the sport, its players, and the future of
EastCoastDodgeball
. This next earth-shaking collision will undoubtedly duplicate the overwhelming success of its predecessors and the two individuals that occupy such a prestigious position couldn't have worked harder or sacrificed more ...
JUSTIN WOLF
versus
JUAN LONDONO
in this match of the year contender!
WOLF
There's only one blocking magician and it's this hungry predator looking to gnaw and swallow the competition come May 31. This kick-ass, no nonsense, top-ranked competitor has fought tooth and nail to reach the pinnacle of a dodgeball warrior's career - his unlimited stamina and unmirrored blocking expertise sure reasons why. Will Wolf have what it takes to "punt" his opposition out of the win column?
Debut
: DODGEBALL LVII on September 23, 2006
Return
: DODGEBALL NINETY NINE on August 4, 2007
Notable Events
:
DODGEBALL 109
, DODGEBALL 119,
DODGEBALL 134
JUAN
"The Cockroach" has long since dispelled the notion that he's the resident "comedy relief", becoming one of the absolute toughest and deadliest combatants to ever compete. Hotly-contested wars with legends Tom Adams and Rob Avakian gained him the peer admiration and on-court success most players wish they could achieve. Like his counterpart in this milestone 140th extravaganza, he too will be making his season finale captains debut, and deservingly so. Will Juan serve a poisonous muffin to his number one adversary?
Debut
: DODGEBALL 73 on January 20, 2007
Return
: (Regular since)
Notable Events
: DODGEBALL 78,
DODGEBALL 106
,
DODGEBALL CXV
Don't forget about what's at stake either. Aside from a lifetime supply of bragging rights, the victor advances as the first of six generals at DODGEBALL 150 in August! Time to rock and roll gentlemen!
And We're Not Done Yet!
A red hot, high octane soundtrack, wild decorations and posters, and the celebratory Pete and Elda's afterparty are three-plus reasons to get your a** to Wall High School on May 31! Feel the electricity and experience the excitement of the incredible DODGEBALL CXL beginning at 7pm!
Check out the official theme song of DODGEBALL CXL, Gary Glitter's "Rock and Roll", by clicking
HERE
!
body_html:
Support RELAY FOR LIFE!
EastCoastDodgeball lends a helping hand in the fight against cancer! On site will be a special donations bucket set up by the one and the only Melissa Kerr. Every little bit counts!

A "Family Affair"!
The countdown will cease to exist once Saturday, May 31, rolls around. Finally, the parents, guardians, and family members of the diehard dodgeballers of the modern era pay a visit to the hallowed battlegrounds. Will the respected matriarchs and patriarchs of such superstars take a chance and fight alongside their precious gems? You won't know unless you show!

Raffle Information
Players - make sure your loved ones bring the special raffle ticket stapled to the second mailed letter! Only the 'rents who attend are eligible for the grand prize!

The MAIN EVENT!
Tronolone vs. Megill, C. Adams vs. Fitzpatrick, T. Adams vs. Pierce, Letsche vs. Cornero - titanic-sized clashes that each left an indelible mark on the sport, its players, and the future of EastCoastDodgeball. This next earth-shaking collision will undoubtedly duplicate the overwhelming success of its predecessors and the two individuals that occupy such a prestigious position couldn't have worked harder or sacrificed more ... JUSTIN WOLF versus JUAN LONDONO in this match of the year contender!

WOLF
There's only one blocking magician and it's this hungry predator looking to gnaw and swallow the competition come May 31. This kick-ass, no nonsense, top-ranked competitor has fought tooth and nail to reach the pinnacle of a dodgeball warrior's career - his unlimited stamina and unmirrored blocking expertise sure reasons why. Will Wolf have what it takes to "punt" his opposition out of the win column?

Debut: DODGEBALL LVII on September 23, 2006
Return: DODGEBALL NINETY NINE on August 4, 2007
Notable Events: DODGEBALL 109, DODGEBALL 119, DODGEBALL 134

JUAN
"The Cockroach" has long since dispelled the notion that he's the resident "comedy relief", becoming one of the absolute toughest and deadliest combatants to ever compete. Hotly-contested wars with legends Tom Adams and Rob Avakian gained him the peer admiration and on-court success most players wish they could achieve. Like his counterpart in this milestone 140th extravaganza, he too will be making his season finale captains debut, and deservingly so. Will Juan serve a poisonous muffin to his number one adversary?

Debut: DODGEBALL 73 on January 20, 2007
Return: (Regular since)
Notable Events: DODGEBALL 78, DODGEBALL 106, DODGEBALL CXV

Don't forget about what's at stake either. Aside from a lifetime supply of bragging rights, the victor advances as the first of six generals at DODGEBALL 150 in August! Time to rock and roll gentlemen!

And We're Not Done Yet!
A red hot, high octane soundtrack, wild decorations and posters, and the celebratory Pete and Elda's afterparty are three-plus reasons to get your a** to Wall High School on May 31! Feel the electricity and experience the excitement of the incredible DODGEBALL CXL beginning at 7pm!

Check out the official theme song of DODGEBALL CXL, Gary Glitter's "Rock and Roll", by clicking HERE!
